0.Cons: No there's not room for bigger salary

4.Cons: Bosses always seemed to be in a bad mood

5.Pros: The people, the management, getting to make kids days, easy advancement

6.Pros: Very fun job, hours go by fast.

7.Pros: Managers always ensured that I got my breaks. The work was pretty simple. Everything was straight forward and rules were always followed.

8.Pros: Good pay, learn how to get along with people
